snippet.title: Super Valis IV (SNES) Playthrough - NintendoComplete
snippet.description:
A complete playthrough of Atlus' 1993 SNES platformer, Super Valis IV. Played on hard mode.

If you've not played the PC Engine version, this is a pretty good game. It looks, sounds, and plays well. Unfortunately, if you do play the original version, you'll realize what a hack job the SNES port is. Though it stands on its own just fine, there really is no reason to play it over the CD version that contains more levels, multiple characters, a coherent storyline, and other stuff. 

It's also entirely too easy on normal mode. Hard mode isn't particular difficult (at least, until the end bosses), but it at least provides some challenge.

_______
No cheats were used during the recording of this video. 

NintendoComplete (http://www.nintendocomplete.com/) punches you in the face with in-depth reviews, screenshot archives, and music from classic 8-bit NES games!
